Data Fields
fifo_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » FIFO Buffer

FIFO Attributes. More...

#include <fifo.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes of a FIFO. The attributes are read-only using I_FIFO_ATTR.

Data Fields

u32 o_flags
 

Field Documentation

◆ o_flags

u32 fifo_attr_t::o_flags

Use to set the write block
